Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii


As the ship careened through transwarp, the pilot, a recent escapee from Cybertron's harshest prision made sure everything was right. A Transwarp gate opened above Earth's atmosphere and the ship came rushing outof it, failing to drop from Transwarp, it did though, as it hit the atmosphere, the pilot inside did his best to level the ship, but to no avail. The ship crashed with a thunderous boom into the ground. From the mangeled form of the ship a large figure emerged, it was a very familiar shape, the same body as Megatron's Transmetal 2 form. Only this one was ice blue where the light red parts had been, and dark blue where the darker reds were. The dragon's eyes glowed yellow.

He transformed, again, besides a different color scheme, he looked like Megatron, they could have been twins. Except for his face. At a quick glance, it looked strikingly similar to Optimus Prime, but closer inspection showed the differences. This face was much evilier, his yellow eyes surrounded by black, the face plate was much pointer than Prime's, and over it were two sharp edged plates, he appeared to have massive horns coming from this "helmet", and in the center of his forehead was a double spiked crest, with a mixture of the Predacon and Decpticon logos on it. In fact, his entire face was designed specifically to look like the (G1) Decpticon logo.

 

One of his huge, clawed feet came crashing down onto the earth, then the other one. The dragon streached. Then a deep, mechanical voice erupted from under the face plate, "Ahh...Megatron, so we will finally end our petty squabble. Here, on this planet."



---------------------------------
